to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased

to draw in one's claws/to show some modesty

sentences.english: Internationally, Miscanthus Anderss is considered one of the most potential plant of energy crops.
sentences.chinese: 国际上，芒属植物被认为是最有潜力的能源作物之一。

sentences.english: Generally, the type of A. nuda with shorter awn have a stronger productivity of seed.
sentences.chinese: 芒越短，产种性能越高，籽实也更饱满。

sentences.english: Assimilatorypower and compensation intensity of canopy leaves and awns were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 分析讨论了冠层叶片和芒的同化能力和补偿能力。

sentences.english: David Clemo says the group hopes to bring attention to American troops.
sentences.chinese: 大卫克莱芒表示，集团希望，使人们关注美国部队。

sentences.english: Plant resources and its exploitation, utilization of the genus Miscanthus in Anhui Province.
sentences.chinese: 安徽省的芒属植物资源及其开发利用。

sentences.english: Megamachaine is the main concept in Mumford's technology philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 巨机器是芒福德技术哲学思想的主要概念。

sentences.english: Rest-harrow and ladies-slipper grow in the turf here.
sentences.chinese: 这儿的草皮上长着芒柄花和女拖花。

sentences.english: Through adversity, Stockholm was able to truly see how his personality was.
sentences.chinese: 通过逆境，斯多克芒才得以认清自己的个性。

sentences.english: At last, the authors put forward a proposal for Miscanthus Anderss research status.
sentences.chinese: 笔者针对目前芒属植物的研究现状提出了相应的建议。

sentences.english: Tympanum with an eight-rayed sun emblem.
Use a different type of drive center to mount an alternative light pull.
sentences.chinese: 中心使用了不同类型的驱动器替代轻拉芒。

sentences.english: Dicranopteris is the plant indicator for acid soils.
sentences.chinese: 芒箕骨是酸性土指示植物，繁殖快，抗逆性强。

sentences.english: I even saw a dog in the mans cheek.
sentences.chinese: 我什至看到狗在芒脸颊。

sentences.english: Pure white was obtained by entirely effacing the burr and burnishing the plate.
sentences.chinese: 光白部份则把芒刺激完全磨去。

sentences.english: This shortened distance allows the installation of the Bell Crank mount.
sentences.chinese: 缩短距离，这使曲轴安装贝尔芒。

definition: silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the tail of the dipper
divine light (around the Buddha)/a halo/a miraculous column of light/(slang) jolly good!
(dialect) intensity of the fire (in cooking, kiln firing etc)
